name: Bathoven
description:
Bathoven is a sound game about a curious little bat exploring a cave. Use your bat sonar on the resonant crystals to progress through the game and develop the musical ambience. Once all of the crystals are resonating, you win!

Controls: WASD to move, left click to use sonar.

Created for the Global Game Jam at the University of Southern California, Los Angeles.

Winner of Best Sound at the Global Game Jam @ USC.
